Sentencas: Strontium and magnesium doped lanthanum gallate, La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85 (LSGM) and a few compositions of calcia (CaO) incorporated LSGM, La(0.9-x)CaxSr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85; x <= 0.10, were prepared by conventional solid state ceramic route.
Titulo: Investigations on structural and electrical properties of calcium substituted LSGM electrolyte materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The X-ray diffraction patterns showed orthorhombic LSGM phase along with a few impure secondary phases.
Titulo: Investigations on structural and electrical properties of calcium substituted LSGM electrolyte materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: SEM micrograph depicted fairly dense grain morphology of the system.
Titulo: Investigations on structural and electrical properties of calcium substituted LSGM electrolyte materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The textural properties were also found to be quite suitable for solid oxide fuel cell electrolyte applications.
Titulo: Investigations on structural and electrical properties of calcium substituted LSGM electrolyte materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of the systems was measured in the frequency range 20 Hz to 1 MHz and temperature range 300-800 degrees C.
Titulo: Investigations on structural and electrical properties of calcium substituted LSGM electrolyte materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The total conductivity of the system was found to first increase up to x=0.05 and thereafter it decreased for higher concentrations of the dopant.
Titulo: Investigations on structural and electrical properties of calcium substituted LSGM electrolyte materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: A small amount of calcia (upto x=0.05) scavenges the intergranular secondary impure phases resulting in a significant increase in grainboundary conduction.
Titulo: Investigations on structural and electrical properties of calcium substituted LSGM electrolyte materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The presence of extra secondary phases in the higher compositions has been attributed to decrease in electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Investigations on structural and electrical properties of calcium substituted LSGM electrolyte materials for IT-SOFC
Investigations on structural and electrical properties of calcium substituted LSGM electrolyte materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: Elsevier Ltd and Techna Group S.r.l.
Titulo: Investigations on structural and electrical properties of calcium substituted LSGM electrolyte materials for IT-SOFC
Investigations on structural and electrical properties of calcium substituted LSGM electrolyte materials for IT-SOFC
